title: Her Dark Awakening
description: 𝘈𝘭𝘦𝘴𝘴𝘪𝘢 𝘓𝘰𝘳𝘦𝘯𝘻𝘰 𝘪𝘴 𝘵𝘩𝘳𝘰𝘸𝘯 𝘪𝘯𝘵𝘰 𝘢 𝘸𝘰𝘳𝘭𝘥 𝘶𝘯𝘬𝘯𝘰𝘸𝘯 𝘵𝘰 𝘩𝘦𝘳,𝘈𝘯𝘥 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘰𝘯𝘭𝘺 𝘸𝘢𝘺 𝘵𝘰 𝘴𝘶𝘳𝘷𝘪𝘷𝘦,𝘪𝘴 𝘵𝘰 𝘣𝘦𝘤𝘰𝘮𝘦 𝘢 𝘥𝘦𝘮𝘰𝘯𝘦𝘴𝘴,𝘵𝘰 𝘥𝘦𝘧𝘦𝘢𝘵 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘥𝘦𝘮𝘰𝘯 𝘩𝘪𝘮𝘴𝘦𝘭𝘧.𝙁𝙚𝙢𝙢𝙚 𝙁𝙖𝙩𝙖𝙡𝙚𝘼𝙜𝙚 𝙂𝙖𝙥𝘿𝙖𝙧𝙠 𝙍𝙤𝙢𝙖𝙣𝙘𝙚𝙈𝙖𝙛𝙞𝙖𝙎𝙡𝙤𝙬 𝘽𝙪𝙧𝙣Grief should be the first thing she feels, but unease creeps in instead. Returning home isn’t just about mourning; it’s stepping into a world of secrets, betrayals, and power struggles. Leonardo Moretti is a ruthless, calculating mayor who thrives in the shadows of politics and crime. To the public, he’s a leader. To Alessia, he’s a threat, an enigma who knows more than he lets on. He’s not just part of this game; he’s playing it, and whether she likes it or not, she’s now a piece on his board. The girl who left was free.The woman returning will never be the same.
author: Jasmine Rov
